articles.title: Congratulations to National Leadership of Baath Arab Socialist Party
articles.content:
Congratulations to National Leadership of Baath Arab Socialist Party
						
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Monday sent a congratulatory message to the National Leadership of the Baath Arab Socialist Party on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of its founding.
					 The message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties would invariably grow stronger and wished the Baath Arab Socialist Party and people greater successes in the struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country and territorial integrity under the correct leadership of President Bashar Al-Assad.

articles.title: Congratulations to President of C.C., Mozambique Liberation Front Party
articles.content:
Congratulations to President of C.C., Mozambique Liberation Front Party
						
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Sunday sent warm congratulations to Filipe Nwussi on his election as president of the Central Committee of the Mozambique Liberation Front Party at its annual congress,  
					 The message said that his election as president of the Central Committee of the party was a manifestation of its Central Committee and its all members' deep trust and expectation for him. 
					
					 It expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties would grow stronger in the future and wished the president great success in his responsible work for the strengthening of  the party and achieving national unity and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 22nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's  election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and the 3rd anniversary of Kim Jong Un's election to the top post of the party and the state.
					 The floral basket and congratulatory letter were conveyed Army General of the KPA  Hyon Yong Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by Zhang Ping, military, naval and air attache of the Chinese Embassy who is doyen of the military attaches corps, on Monday.

articles.title: S. Korean Peasants' Action for Agricultural Sovereignty and Vital Rights Supported
articles.content:
S. Korean Peasants' Action for Agricultural Sovereignty and Vital Rights Supported
						
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Actions of peasants are mounting high in south Korea to resolutely oppose the authorities' humiliating moves for acceding to the Trans-Pacific Partnership (TPP) and defend the agricultural sovereignty and vital rights.
					 A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea said in a statement on Monday in this regard:
					
					 The farmland in south Korea is turning into military bases of the U.S. imperialists and theatres for north-targeted war drills and it is flooded with surplus farm produce of foreign countries, threatening the life of the peasants due to the puppet forces' sycophancy and act of treachery and unpopular moves to ruin agriculture.
					
					 This goes to prove that the puppet conservative regime is heinous pro-U.S. lackeys and traitors without an equal in the world as it is acting against the destiny and interests of the impoverished peasants in order to meet the U.S. interests.
					
					 Such group of traitors and unpopular bandits as the puppet conservative regime and the "Saenuri Party" should be eliminated without fail as they are working hard to infringe upon even the vital rights of the peasants, not content with having reduced south Korea to a colony of the U.S. and forward base for a nuclear war.
					
					 It is necessary to overthrow the rule of traitors in south Korea. This is the way for the south Korean peasants to survive and the way of retaking the democratic right and vital rights desired by the toiling masses.
					
					 The south Korean peasants should firmly join hands with the people of different social standings and vigorously turn out in the nationwide actions to put an end to the disgusting unpopular rule, bearing in mind that there is nothing to expect from the puppet conservative group keen to prolong its remaining days for selling off national interests to foreign forces. 
					
					 All the agricultural workers in the northern half of Korea will always voice positive support to the south Korean peasants out in the righteous actions to win back justice and democracy and protect their means of living as they do the same job of cultivating this land, a treasure common to the nation.

articles.title: Indonesian Embassy Officials Visit International Friendship Exhibition House
articles.content:
Indonesian Embassy Officials Visit International Friendship Exhibition House
						
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Indonesian Ambassador to the DPRK Bambang Hiendrasto and his embassy officials visited the International Friendship Exhibition House on Monday on the occasion of the 50th anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il's visit to Indonesia and the naming of a flower Kimilsungia.
					 They paid tribute to the wax replicas of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 They looked round gifts presented by many heads of parties, states and governments and prominent officials of different countries of the world to the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, fascinated by them.
					
					 The ambassador made an entry in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Kaesong Area, One of Tourist Attractions in DPRK
articles.content:
Kaesong Area, One of Tourist Attractions in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Kaesong City is one of tourist attractions in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 According to an official of the State General Bureau of Tourism, the city's tourist destinations include the monument to the autograph of President Kim Il Sung in Panmunjom, the hall where the Armistice Agreement was signed, Koryo Museum and historical sites.
					
					 What catch one's eyes in the city are 12 historical sites and relics listed as world's cultural heritages.
					
					 Tourist bus line has been put on service between Pyongyang and Kaesong.
					
					 Tour of Kaesong area mainly takes one day.

articles.title: 10th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
articles.content:
10th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked 
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- A seminar took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday to mark the 10th anniversary of the publication of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Kimilsungia Is an Immortal Flower Blooming in the Hearts of Humankind in the Era of Independence." 
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 94 (2005), deals with the historical position of Kimilsungia, significance of its cultivation and tasks for bringing into bloom everywhere in Korea the flower of the sun, treasure common to mankind.
					
					 Present at the seminar were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, officials concerned, officials of armed forces organs and ministries and national institutions and other people in the city. 
					
					 The seminar heard papers conveying stories about Kimilsungia and reflecting the fixed faith and will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to bring into fuller bloom the flower, that has taken its roots deep in the homeland, as flower of the sun in the Songun era. 
					
					 Speakers called for adding eternal brilliance to the feats of Kim Jong Il who made Kimilsungia an eternal flower of Juche Korea, the most famous flower in the world, and eternal treasure common to mankind, true to the noble intention of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work Marked
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- It has been 60 years since President Kim Il Sung made public his celebrated work "Every Effort for the Country's Reunification and Independence and for Socialist Construction in the Northern Half of the Republic" in April Juche 44 (1955).
					 In the work the President provided highly important guidelines for Korea's reunification and socialist construction in the DPRK.
					
					 The work indicates the main tasks, motive forces, objects and character of the Korean revolution, as well as the ways for uniting and arousing all the patriotic forces in the north and the south of Korea to a nationwide struggle against the U.S. imperialists and stepping up the socialist revolution in the north.
					
					 It also clarifies the idea of invariably adhering to the independent line of the revolution and strengthening the armed forces in every way along with the party and the state power.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Work Marked
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday dedicates an article to the 3rd anniversary of the publication of Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party".
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the issue of consolidating the single-minded unity of the party and the revolutionary ranks in every way and thoroughly embodying the Songun revolutionary line. It also indicates the tasks and ways to successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The past three years since the work was published were a period which witnessed a striking demonstration of the steadfast will of the WPK to hold fast to the idea and exploits of leader Kim Jong Il as its lifeline, the article says, adding:
					
					 The WPK is a powerful revolutionary party upholding the great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as an ever-victorious banner and an invincible party consolidating in every way the single-minded unity, the precious revolutionary legacy left by Kim Jong Il, and a militant party making a breakthrough towards building a thriving nation by dint of Songun. 
					
					 All aspects of party building and activities are going on in line with the ideas and intentions of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. All the people are fully preparing themselves as persons strong in idea and faith amid the historic advance for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Thanks to the party's Songun revolutionary leadership and Songun politics, the army and the people are united close in thinking and work style and the political and ideological might of the country and the revolution has grown stronger than ever before. 
					
					 Thanks to the ranks of all service persons and people holding high the arms of Mt. Paektu and the might of the army-people great unity which has grown unbreakable in the struggle for defending socialism and building a thriving nation, the enemy's any attempt at aggression is bound to go totally bankrupt.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. World's Biggest Nuclear Proliferator
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. World's Biggest Nuclear Proliferator
						
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- No country in the world is so talkative about nuclear proliferation as the U.S. and it is the only country on our planet which seriously distorts NPT, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 This was clearly evidenced by the outbursts let loose by a spokesperson for the U.S. Department of State recently that the U.S. deployment of nuclear weapons in member nations of NATO and development of nuclear technology together with non-nuclear states of NATO are in line with NPT, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 During the era of the Cold War the U.S. deployed nuclear weapons in NATO member nations and kept them even after the demise of the Cold War era and has staged joint nuclear war rehearsals with non-nuclear states in Europe.
					
					 The U.S. was the nuclear war criminal as it was the first to inflict a nuclear disaster on mankind. It is, therefore, under heavier obligation to realize nuclear disarmament than any other countries.
					
					 The situation on the Korean peninsula goes to clearly prove to what alarming phase the wrong nuclear policy of the U.S. pushed the situation. In the true sense of the word, south Korea has turned into the world's greatest nuclear forward base of the U.S. and a base for invading the north.
					
					 It is ridiculous, indeed, for the U.S. to talk about "sincerity" on the part of the DPRK while crying out for the denuclearization of the Korean peninsula. The U.S. should not mock at the international community with the initiative to build "a world without nuclear weapons." 
					
					 Washington had better not dream of the denuclearization of the Korean peninsula before realizing the denuclearization of the world. This is the fixed will of the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Can Never Evade Blame for Espionage against DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Can Never Evade Blame for Espionage against DPRK: Rodong Sinmun 
						
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- It is undisputable hard fact that the  recently arrested south Korean spies had conducted most vicious state-sponsored terrorism and espionage against the DPRK under the backstage wire-pulling and instructions of the U.S. and south Korean puppet authorities. This was proved by their confessions, statements and convincing evidence. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in an article in this regard: 
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces are spreading wild rumors about "detention" and "abduction." This is the despicable behavior which can be conceived only by shameless tricksters. 
					
					 Noting that the south Korean puppet forces are ringleader of terrorism and the arch criminal hatching plots as they are engrossed in espionage and conspiratorial acts to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and bring down its socialist system, the article goes on:
					
					 Typical example of this was the case of the "association for demolishing statues" which was unmasked and frustrated in 2012 while trying to destroy monuments to the immortality of the leaders and praising them, symbols of the dignity of the supreme leadership. 
					
					 Like their  U.S. master, the present south Korean ruling quarters obsessed with ambition for "bringing down the north" have been busy with the moves for escalating the confrontation and achieving "the unification of social systems," far from working for the improvement of the north-south relations. 
					
					 What merits serious attention is that the south Korean puppet forces have desperately worked to dare hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. 
					
					 They have run the whole gamut of rhetoric to cover up their hideous state-sponsored political terrorism. This is, however, nothing but mere complaints of the criminals caught red-handed. 
					
					 With no sleight of hand can they evade the responsibility for the thrice-cursed crimes. 
					
					 The anti-DPRK spies and tricksters will have to pay dearly for their crimes.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Its Jargon Denying Truth behind Cheonan Warship Sinking Case
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Its Jargon Denying Truth behind Cheonan Warship Sinking Case
						
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Hwang Su, an honorary professor at Kyongsong University of south Korea, when interviewed by the newspaper Media Today on April 1, reiterated his assertion that the Cheonan warship was sunken after colliding with a submarine, refuting the jargon told by the puppet regime to deny the truth behind the warship sinking case.
					 In a study paper titled "What caused the sinking of Cheonan warship in actuality?" which he jointly contributed to an international scientific magazine together with a researcher of Cambridge University, he claimed that there is high possibility that the warship was sunken by collision with a submarine.
					
					 Refuting this, an administrative official of Chongwadae of south Korea, said the depth of the waters where the warship was sunken was only 47 meters, too low for any U.S. submarine to operate, adding that even though the problematic submarine had risen to surface there, it could never have hit the middle part of the warship in such a depth.
					
					 Those of the "Saenuri Party" were busy terming the claim "a false rumor."
					
					 As regards the comment, Kim queried why the 30 meter high submarine can not operate in 47 meter depth.
					
					 The fact that the bow of the warship turned 200 degrees when sinking clearly proved its collision with a submarine, he added.
					
					 He deplored the political camp disregarding science.
					
					 He also blamed the chief of the joint investigation group for taking the lead in checking the probe into the truth behind the disaster.

articles.title: Bereaved Families of Ferry Sewol Disaster Have Their Heads Shaven in Protest against Regime
articles.content:
Bereaved Families of Ferry Sewol Disaster Have Their Heads Shaven in Protest against Regime
						
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Bereaved families of the ferry Sewol disaster had their hair cut short in protest against the south Korean puppet regime blocking the probe into the truth behind the disaster at the Kwanghwamun Plaza of Seoul on April 2.
					 They held a press conference at which they slammed the regime for disturbing the activities of the ad hoc committee for probing the truth behind the disaster and setting forth guidelines for annulling the special law on it.
					
					 They said they could hardly repress their anger at those evading the responsibility for the disaster and insulting the bereaved families. 
					
					They urged the regime to retract the guidelines and salvage the sunken ferry immediately.
					
					 Then followed a ceremony of hair cutting.
					
					 On the same day a protest action was staged by bereaved families at Phaengmok Port of Jin Island in South Jolla Province of south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Flailed for Obstructing Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Flailed for Obstructing Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
						
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Overseas Koreans released a statement on March 30 to denounce the puppet Park Geun Hye group for blocking the probe into the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster, according to Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S.
					 The families of the victims of the disaster have done all they could such as foot march, hunger strike and signature campaign to probe the truth and many people in south Korea and overseas compatriots joined the bereaved families in their actions, the statement said.
					
					 But the south Korean regime and the ruling party have hamstrung these efforts and worked hard to annul the special law on the ferry Sewol disaster, it noted.
					
					 All overseas Koreans demanded the south Korean regime and the ruling party abolish at once the "enforcement ordinance", ensure the independent activities of the ad hoc investigation committee and stop obstructing it at once, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 All overseas Koreans will never remain a passive onlooker to the conservative forces obstructing the probe into the truth about the disaster but stage actions in solidarity with the bereaved families and honest-minded citizens of the world.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Slammed for Disturbing Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Tragedy
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Slammed for Disturbing Probe into Truth about Ferry Sewol Tragedy 
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society in south Korea issued a statement on April 2 to denounce the puppet forces for disturbing the probe into truth about the ferry Sewol tragedy.
					 The statement recalled that the bereaved families have been on a sit-in strike demanding the regime to abolish the "enforcement ordinance" related to the special law on the ferry Sewol disaster and properly salvage the ferry body since some days ago.
					
					 The regime's "enforcement ordinance" censured by the people should be abolished immediately as it is aimed to annul the mandate of the ad hoc investigation committee of the ferry Sewol disaster, it held.
					
					 To immediately salvage the ferry body is an act of finding out those missing to the last person and an important issue to secure the core evidence for probing the truth about it, it said, urging the regime to make an immediate decision to salvage the ferry body.
					
					 It declared the will to stage a positive action to check all moves of the regime to conceal the truth, and thoroughly probe the truth and ensure a safe life of people.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Authorities Slammed for Their Fascist Suppression of Progressive Forces
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Authorities Slammed for Their Fascist Suppression of Progressive Forces
						
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Seoul Central District Prosecutor's Office on April 2 searched the houses of five persons concerned of the former Unified Progressive Party and confiscated documents. On March 30 it made a non-restraint complaint against members of the party on charges of the violation of the "law on assembly and demonstration".
					 The fascist prosecution labeled their rally for denouncing the unreasonable verdict made by the puppet constitutional court to forcibly dissolve the legitimate political party as illegal. 
					
					 It also indicted a co-representative of the Solidarity for Progress for staging an action in protest against the election rigging by the present chief executive.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Denounces Military Group for Its Red Herring Concerning Deployment of THAAD
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Denounces Military Group for Its Red Herring Concerning Deployment of THAAD 
						
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea on April 3 held the 155th rally for peace and disarmament outside the puppet Ministry of Defense to denounce the military group for resorting to red herring concerning the deployment of THAAD. 
					 Speakers at the rally referred to the fact that the Ministry of Defense said that there was neither negotiation nor decision on the deployment of THAAD as there was no request for it from the U.S. 
					
					 But recently the chairman of the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff said south Korea, U.S. and Japan are in the middle of establishing triangular missile defense system and south Korea is mulling purchasing THAAD, the speakers said, and went on: This goes to prove that the military authorities have so far deceived the people.
					
					 The deployment of this offensive weapon will threaten the people and knock into shape another Cold War structure in Northeast Asia while laying a big hurdle in the way of achieving the peace on the Korean peninsula and national reunification. 
					
					 The military authorities should no longer pull the wool over the eyes of the people but resolutely reject the U.S. pressure for the deployment of THAAD.

articles.title: Swiss, Austrian Organizations Accuse Japanese Authorities of Suppressing Chongryon
articles.content:
Swiss, Austrian Organizations Accuse Japanese Authorities of Suppressing Chongryon
						
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Swiss and Austrian organizations sent letters to the Japanese embassies in Bern and Vienna on March 29 and 31 in protest against the Japanese authorities' brigandish suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee said:
					
					 We bitterly denounce the Japanese police authorities for their search of the houses of the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee.
					
					 Such violence is an intolerable crime and fascist terrorist act against Chongryon and the Koreans in Japan and discrimination and human rights abuse against the Koreans.
					
					 Chongryon is a legitimate overseas citizens' organization of the DPRK and the chairman and a vice-chairman are deputies to its Supreme People's Assembly.
					
					 Chongryon plays the role of diplomatic mission representing the DPRK in the absence of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Japan.
					
					 We strongly demand the Japanese government make an apology to the DPRK for the suppression of Chongryon.
					
					 We extend firm solidarity to Chongryon and Koreans in Japan who are struggling for national democratic right.
					
					 The Solidarity Committee of Unionists for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in Austria said:
					
					 We can hardly repress resentment against the Japanese police authorities' suppression of Chongryon.
					
					 With nothing can the authorities justify their most hideous crackdown on Chongryon.
					
					 We urge the Japanese authorities to stop at once the suppression.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed in Russia
						
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks and lecture took place in Nakhodka of Russia on Mar. 31 and April 1 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Present at the events were personages of various circles and masses.
					
					 Lovoda, secretary of the Regional Political Council of the Nakhodka City Branch of the Maritime Territory of the "United Russia" Party, praised Kim Il Sung as a prominent leader who laid a strong foundation for the DPRK to always emerge victorious, undeterred by the moves of the U.S. to stifle it.
					
					 Thanks to his leadership, the DPRK has turned into a socialist power, weathering all sorts of difficulties and trials.
					
					 Mishkin, chairman of the Nakhodka Regional Committee of the A Just Russia, said:
					
					 The most just are the ideology and line set forth by the great Comrade Kim Il Sung. It is exactly the Korean-style socialist system that attaches importance to the popular masses and ensures their happy life.
					
					 We deeply study the works of the President and leader Kim Jong Il and apply them to practice.
					
					 We will learn from the DPRK's rich experience.

articles.title: German Organization Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
articles.content:
German Organization Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
						
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted an article on its website on March 31 on the occasion of the 33rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On the Juche Idea."
					 The article said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il authored the famous work "On the Juche Idea" on March 31, Juche 71 (1982) by comprehensively systematizing and dealing with the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 In the work he clarified the origin of the Juche idea and its philosophical principles, socio-historical principles, guiding principles and historic significance.
					
					 The President highly appreciated the work of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 For over three decades since the publication of the work, the truth and great vitality of the Juche idea have been fully displayed in the DPRK and the idea has become steadfast faith of the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The Songun politics pursued by the Workers' Party of Korea is an independent one strictly based on the Juche idea.
					
					 The revolutionary soldier spirit, Kanggye spirit and the torches of Songgang and Ranam are rooted in that idea.
					
					 The historical victory of the Songun revolution displays the triumph of the Juche idea and its great vitality.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK are making a dynamic advance for building a thriving nation under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea.

articles.title: World Conscience Strongly Censures Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket: Syrian Paper
articles.content:
World Conscience Strongly Censures Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket: Syrian Paper
						
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- The Syrian paper Al Baath carried an article titled "Unreasonable 'human rights' offensive against the DPRK" on March 29.
					 The article said:
					
					 The U.S. set in motion its followers for railroading the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" through the third committee of the 69th UN General Assembly and is busy with the "human rights" offensive against it.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, this is a plot to launch a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. has so far pursued hostile policies of all hues against the DPRK such as political isolation, economic blockade and military threat.
					
					 When those policies do no work on the DPRK, the U.S. is working hard to use "human rights issue" as a lever for armed intervention in a bid to create fresh environment for invading the DPRK.
					
					 It is the trite method for the U.S. to cite "human rights protection" as a pretext for invading other countries and toppling their governments.
					
					 The Gulfs War and wars in Balkans, Afghanistan and Iraq are typical examples proving the above-said fact.
					
					 The U.S. "human rights" racket against the DPRK is not temporary tactics but a long-term strategy. It is the U.S. goal to invade and stifle the DPRK under the pretence of "human rights issue."
					
					 The world conscience strongly censures the unreasonable "human rights" racket against the DPRK by the U.S. and its followers.

articles.title: Reinvestigation into Cheonan Warship Sinking Case Demanded by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Reinvestigation into Cheonan Warship Sinking Case Demanded by Swiss Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on March 25 in support of the statement of a spokesman for the Policy Department of the DPRK National Defence Commission which re-clarified the principled stand of the DPRK on the Cheonan warship sinking case and the "May 24 step" taken by the south Korean regime under its pretext.
					 The joint statement said:
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly want to see improved inter-Korean relations, they should lift the unreasonable "May 24 step" and immediately respond to the DPRK's call for reinvestigating the case.
					
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea actively support the statement of the spokesman for the Policy Department of the DPRK National Defence Commission and join the Korean friends in demanding the south Korean regime lift the "May 24 step" at once and immediately reinvestigate the Cheonan case.

articles.title: Mauritanian President Wishes Korean People Success in Their Drive for Prosperity
articles.content:
Mauritanian President Wishes Korean People Success in Their Drive for Prosperity
						
 Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- Choe Hyok Chol, DPRK ambassador to Mauritania, presented his credentials to Mohamed Ould Abdel Aziz, president of the Republic of Mauritania, on April 1.
					 At the meeting the president said that the relations between Mauritania and the DPRK are long-standing friendly and cooperative ones.
					
					 He hoped that the two countries would closely cooperate with each other in political, economic and all other fields.
					
					 Thanks to the wise guidance of respected HE Kim Jong Un the Korean people would achieve greater successes in their efforts for the prosperity of the country while overcoming all difficulties despite the tense situation on the Korean peninsula, he said.

articles.title: CC de PTC felicita 68o aniversario de fundacion de BAAS
articles.content:
CC de PTC felicita 68o aniversario de fundacion de BAAS
						
Pyongyang, 6 de abril (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea envio el dia 6 un mensaje de felicitacion a la direccion nacional del Partido Socialista del Resurgimiento Arabe (BAAS) con motivo del 68o aniversario de fundacion de esta organizacion.
					La misiva expresa la conviccion de que en el futuro tambien, se fortaleceran las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos partidos y desea mayores exitos en la lucha del BAAS y el pueblo sirio por defender la soberania y la integridad territorial del pais bajo la correcta orientacion de Su Excelencia Presidente Bashar al-Assad.

articles.title: Portavoz de CC de UTAC apoya lucha de campesinos surcoreanos
articles.content:
Portavoz de CC de UTAC apoya lucha de campesinos surcoreanos
						
Pyongyang, 6 de abril (ACNC) -- En estos dias, en el Sur de Corea se desarrolla furiosamente la lucha de los campesinos por rechazar tajantemente la firma de la iniciativa de colaboracion transpacifica y por defender la soberania de la agricultura y el derecho a vivir.
					En su declaracion fechada 6, el portavoz del Comite Central de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea senalo que debido al servilismo a las grandes potencias y las maniobras de la banda titere encaminadas a exterminar la agricultura, el territorio surcoreano se ha convertido en la base militar de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea y en el campo de ejercicios de guerra de agresion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la vida de los campesinos se ve amenazada por la inundacion de los productos agricolas sobrantes hechos en otros paises.
					
					De veras, las autoridades conservadoras titeres son los traidores vendepatrias y pro-yanqui sin precedentes, que exterminan hasta el destino y el interes de los campesinos empobrecidos para defender el interes de su amo norteamericano, denuncio asi el portavoz y continuo:
					
					Hay que eliminar a la banda traidora antipopular de las autoridades conservadoras titeres y el "Partido Saenuri", que insatisfechos con haber dejado el Sur de Corea como colonia de EE.UU. y como base avanzada de la guerra nuclear, entregan hasta el derecho a vivir de los campesinos.
					
					Acabar en el Sur de Corea con la dominacion traidora antipopular, he aqui el camino de vivir los campesinos surcoreanos y rescatar el derecho democraticos y el derecho a vivir de las masas populares.
					
					Los campesinos surcoreanos deben tener bien presente que no hay nada de depositar en la banda conservadora titere que intenta mantener su vida restante a cambio del interes de la nacion y levantarse en la gigantesca lucha por acabar con la dominacion antipopular, uniendose con todas las capas.
					
					Todos los trabajadores agricolas de la RPDC apoyaran siempre y activamente la justa lucha de los campesinos surcoreanos que se han levantado por rescatar la justicia y la democracia y defender el nido de su vida.

articles.title: Seminario por 10o aniversario de publicacion de obra de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Seminario por 10o aniversario de publicacion de obra de Kim Jong Il
						
Pyongyang, 6 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 6 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el seminario dedicado al 10o aniversario de la publicacion de la obra del Dirigente Kim Jong Il "Es inmarcesible la kimilsungia abierta en la conciencia de la humanidad en la epoca de independencia".
					El trabajo publicado el 6 de abril del 94 (2005) de la Era Juche, aclara la posicion historica de kimilsungia y la significacion del cultivo de esta flor e indica las tareas para que la flor del sol, patrimonio comun de la humanidad florezca  plenamente en cualquier lugar de Corea.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Thae Bok, el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin y otros funcionarios de la rama interesada, las fuerzas armadas, los ministerios y organos centrales y los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					Fueron publicadas las tesis que dan a conocer la historia de kimilsungia y reflejan la sinceridad del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea de hacer florecer plenamente dicha flor cuyas raices fueron echadas en la tierra patria como flor del Sol.
					
					Los oradores subrayaron la necesidad de glorificar eternamente las hazanas del Dirigente quien hizo brillar la flor inmortal como la eterna de Corea de Juche y la mejor en el mundo y hacer florecer kimilsungia como patrimonio comun de la humanidad en pleno acato al noble proposito del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
